snippet: Andy Roddick, who retired from tennis in September at age 30, insisted he was not testing the comeback waters by playing in a South Florida event over the weekend.
abstract: Andy Roddick insists that his victory in exhibition match against Andy Murray at inaugural Miami Tennis Cup is not an indication that he returning to the sport; says he signed to play in the event before announcing his retirement and was simply honoring his commitment.
lead_paragraph: Andy Roddick, who retired from tennis in September at age 30, insisted he was not testing the comeback waters by playing in a South Florida event over the weekend.

headline.seo: Andy Roddick Still Has the Stroke, if Not the Desire
headline.main: The Stroke Remains, but Not the Desire
headline.print_headline: The Stroke Remains, But Not the Desire
